text:
We are looking for a research engineer to develop a light sheet microscope dedicated to neuroscience applications. This position is financed for 3 years by a GPR (_Grands Projets de Recherche_) BRAIN grant and co-supervised by the Interdisciplinary Institute for Neuroscience and the Bordeaux Imaging Center.
For more information see the attached job description.
